title: How can we induce people to be more environmentally friendly and eco-sustainable? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question has nothing to do with the politically induced scam and hysteria relating to CO2 emissions. (morphed into climate change) LISTEN to their concerns and deal with them in an honest and pragmatic way and avoid at all costs bringing the above hysteria into the conversation. Most of the concerns about the environment are to do with local or specific issues. The main message being that as individuals we all need to attempt to put more into the environment etc. than we individually take from it. There are endless examples of where a simple change in mindset towards that end will contribute.

The answer is simple: Show the people that you would change how it is to their own personal advantage to be more environmentally friendly and eco-sustaining. Don’t tell them how much it will benefit someone else. Don’t tell them that their posterity demands it. Don’t tell them that it is their civic duty. Show them - prove to them - that as they move in that direction there is a measurable benefit to them (not just warm fuzzy feelings.)

Insist that banks, governments and international agencies support loans for electric power plants fueled by fossil fuels are funded in third world countries. Today these loans are denied. Environment awareness and care improve consistently when nations have the resources to move beyond subsistance living.

Agree to be governed by a man like Joseph Stalin. Murder 25,000,000 people to get everyone’s attention and then set down some very strict rules to live by. Are you ready to welcome Papa Joe into your life ?
Kick them in the ass when catch them littering. Or crapping on the sidewalk.  Warning. That last can dirty your shoe, but it probably already has dog crap on it…
